revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Nekthnephis, son of Psenobastis, 4 dr.,;Papontos, son of the older Kyrieus, ? 4 dr. with the addition,;Diogenes, son of Smyrito(), 4 dr.,;Pompsais, son of Onnophris, 20 dr. with the addition,;Anoubion, son of Phaesis, 4 dr. with the addition,;Herakleides, son of Sambas, a swineherd, 20 dr.,;Onnophris, son of Pomsais, 8 dr. with the addition,;Hatres, son of Pompsais, ? dr. with the addition,;Theon, son of Dikranes, ? dr. with the addition,;Harphaesis, son of Dikranes, ? dr. with the addition,;Herakles, son of Dikranes, ? dr. with the addition,;Peteuchos, son of Dikranes, ? dr. with the addition,;Hatres, son of Psenosiris,16 dr.,;Phasis, son of Petosiris, son of Lakon, 12 dr.,;Apynchis, son of Nekpheros, 4 dr.,;Marres, son of Melangkomos, 8 dr. with the addition,;Onnophris, son of Harpsemis, 16 dr.,;Petermouthis, likewise, the younger,;Petosiris, son of Herakles the embalmer, 12 dr.,;Petermouthis, son of Petemounis, 12 dr.,;Pouoris, son of the older Hatres, 12 dr. with the addition,;Peteuchos, son of Papontos, 8 dr.,;[....]s, son of Nekpheros, 24 dr.,;Papous, likewise, embalmer, 4 dr., ;Onnophris, son of Pollous, 4 dr.,;Harphaesis, son of Onnophris, 12 dr.,;364,;4th, Nekthatymo(), son of Peteneitos, 12 dr.,;Harphaesis, son of Pompsais, 4 dr.,;Onnophris, likewise, embalmer, 12 dr. with the addition,;Harphaesis, likewise, son of Palemous, 4 dr. with the addition,;Papous, son of Polion, embalmer, 4 dr. with the addition,;Pamieus, son of Apynchis, 4 dr.,;Apynchis, son of Pemsais, 4 dr.,;Ammonis, son of Herakles, son of Philon, 4 dr. with the addition,;Pnepheros, son of Peteuchos, son of Pekre(), 8 dr.,;Peteamounis, son of Peteuchos, son of Plaeto(), 40 dr.,;Panetbys, likewise, 4 dr. with the addition,;Papontos, son of Panetbys, 8 dr. with the addition,;Panetbys, son of Hermias, 4 dr. with the addition,;Panou..s, son of Sisois, 12 dr. with the addition,;Peteuchos, son of Orsenouphis, 20 dr.,;Pnepheros, son of Hatres, 4 dr.,;....teus, likewise, 4 dr.,;Teos, son of Panetbys, 12 dr.,;Keuaus, son of Orsenouphis, 8 dr.,;Peteuchos, son of Penenesis, 20 dr.,;Nekpheros, son of Phan.[], [4 dr.],;At.......s, son of Panomeus, 20 dr. with the addition,;Panetbys, son of Petemouthis, 4 dr. with the addition.
